data.name: BreadcumbArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Navigation Breadcrumb and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: CanClose_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Close button on the title bar. Click on the Close button will close the current layout in runtime.

data.name: CanMaximize_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Maximize button on the title bar.

data.name: CanMinimize_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Minimize button on the title bar.

data.name: CanCloseViewApp_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display the ViewApp Close button on the title bar. Click on the button will close the whole ViewApp in runtime.

data.name: Close_ErrorFormat
data.value: Exception caught while closing the layout from Title bar. {0}

data.name: Close_Tooltip
data.value: Close

data.name: DateArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Date and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: DateTimeArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Date and Time and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: HasSecondary_Description
data.value: Controls whether the title bar has secondary row.

data.name: HomeArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Home button and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: KeyboardArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Keyboard button and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: LanguageArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Runtime Language and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: LoginArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Login command and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: LogIn_Description
data.value: Login

data.name: LogOut_Description
data.value: Logout

data.name: Maximize_ErrorFormat
data.value: Exception caught while maximizing the layout from Title bar. {0}

data.name: Maximize_Tooltip
data.value: Maximize

data.name: Minimize_ErrorFormat
data.value: Exception caught while minimizing the layout from Title bar. {0}

data.name: Minimize_Tooltip
data.value: Minimize

data.name: NavigationTitleArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Navigation Title and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: PrimaryFontFamily_Description
data.value: The font family of the text in primary area of the title bar.

data.name: PrimaryFontSize_Description
data.value: The font size of the text in primary area of the title bar.

data.name: PrimaryFontStyle_Description
data.value: The font style of the text in primary area of the title bar.

data.name: PrimaryFontWeight_Description
data.value: The font weight of the text in primary area of the title bar.

data.name: Title_Description
data.value: The title text displayed in primary left area of the title bar.

data.name: Restore_ErrorFormat
data.value: Exception caught while restoring the layout from Title bar. {0}

data.name: Restore_Tooltip
data.value: Restore

data.name: SecondaryFontFamily_Description
data.value: The font family of the text in secondary area of the title bar.

data.name: SecondaryFontSize_Description
data.value: The font size of the text in secondary area of the title bar.

data.name: SecondaryFontStyle_Description
data.value: The font style of the text in secondary area of the title bar.

data.name: SecondaryFontWeight_Description
data.value: The font weight of the text in secondary area of the title bar.

data.name: TimeArea_Description
data.value: Controls whether to display Time and specify the area in title bar if it's displayed.

data.name: SwitchUser_Description
data.value: Switch User

data.name: Close_App_Tooltip
data.value: Close Application

data.name: Language_Tooltip
data.value: Change the current language of the application.

data.name: LogIn_LoggedIn_Tooltip
data.value: is logged in

data.name: LogIn_NotLoggedIn_Tooltip
data.value: Open the login window.
